intro: Chaseella, commonly known as the desert lily, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Amaryllidaceae. Chaseella species are typically perennial, with some varieties capable of surviving extreme drought conditions. These plants play an important ecological role in desert ecosystems by providing nectar for pollinators and habitat for small animals.
